about_the_game:
Enjoy an exciting fantasy adventure "Connected Hearts: Cost of Beauty DLC"! Mini-games, puzzles and hidden objects await you! Try to find all the hidden objects in the extra locations!
This additional content includes four new locations! You will have to explore your father's study, visit Annie's room, check out your stepmother's room, and also come to the closed exhibition of magical artifacts, where you can definitely find something very interesting and valuable!

In the new locations, you can learn new details about the characters and uncover all the secrets that will help you clear up the whole situation. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

💘 EXPLORE YOUR FATHER'S OFFICE!
Huge heavy cabinets are bursting with books, and windows are covered in heavy curtains. Is this how you envisioned your dad's room? You'll have to scrutinize everything to find even the slightest clue!

💘 VISIT ANNIE'S ROOM!
Can you create a psychological profile based on someone's room? Here, you'll find numerous interesting items and knick-knacks that can certainly provide insights into the Annie’s character.

💘 TAKE A LOOK AROUND THE STEPMOTHER'S DEN!
Among the books, jars, potion flasks and bundles of herbs, you might find something very interesting. You'll have to pay a visit there and find out what exactly this place is hiding!

💘 COME TO A CLOSED EXHIBITION OF MAGICAL ARTIFACTS!
Various amulets, books, candles, as well as minerals and much more can be found at the exhibition of magical artifacts! Solve all the puzzles and find hidden objects!

Step into a world where romance stories and mysterious challenges blend seamlessly! Discover how love can conquer all, even in the face of dark sorcery.
